summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ColdIQ tier features and landing page enhancements. All 23 backend tests passed. All 4 tiers (Free, Starter, Pro, Agency) working correctly with proper feature gating. Landing page testimonials carousel and data-driven stats section functioning as expected.
passed_tests: Landing page: Data-driven stats section visible ('The Numbers Don't Lie')
Landing page: Before/After comparisons showing (Response Rate, Open Rate, Avg Score, Days to Reply)
Landing page: Stats showing 127% Avg Response Increase, 2.4M Emails Analyzed, 18,500+ Active Users
Landing page: Testimonials carousel with 5 testimonials
Landing page: Testimonial navigation arrows work (prev/next)
Landing page: Testimonial dot indicators work
Landing page: Testimonials show author info, company, role, and metric badges
Free tier: Login successful (free@test.com)
Free tier: Shows 0/3 monthly usage limit
Free tier: Insights locked with 'Upgrade to Starter' message
Free tier: Templates locked with 'Upgrade to Pro' message
Free tier: Team nav hidden
Free tier: CSV export forbidden (403)
Starter tier: Login successful (starter@test.com)
Starter tier: Shows 0/50 monthly usage limit
Starter tier: Insights accessible (shows 'No Data Yet')
Starter tier: Templates locked
Starter tier: Team nav hidden
Pro tier: Login successful (pro@test.com)
Pro tier: Shows unlimited analyses (999999)
Pro tier: Templates accessible with 17 templates across 7 industries
Pro tier: Insights accessible
Pro tier: CSV export endpoint accessible
Pro tier: Team nav hidden
Pro tier: Team access forbidden (403)
Agency tier: Login successful (agency@test.com)
Agency tier: Shows unlimited analyses
Agency tier: Team nav visible in sidebar
Agency tier: Team Analytics page accessible
Agency tier: Templates accessible
Agency tier: API Keys accessible in Settings
Agency tier: Settings has Profile, Billing, Team, API tabs
Backend: All 23 pytest tests passed
critical_code_review_comments: Tier feature gating properly implemented in both backend (TIER_FEATURES config) and frontend
Team nav conditionally rendered based on subscription_tier === 'agency'
Templates page shows 17 system templates with industry filters and category filters
Testimonials carousel auto-rotates every 6 seconds with manual navigation
Data-driven stats section shows before/after comparisons with improvement percentages
seed_data_creation: Test accounts already existed for all 4 tiers
context_for_next_testing_agent: All tier features verified working. Free=3 analyses/locked insights/locked templates; Starter=50 analyses/basic insights/locked templates; Pro=unlimited/templates/CSV export; Agency=Pro+Team Analytics+API keys. Landing page has testimonials carousel (5 testimonials, auto-rotate 6s) and data-driven stats section with before/after comparisons.
